item0.name: Broken Stopwatch
item0.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item1.name: Goredrinker
item1.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Sterak's Gage
item3.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 200 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

item4.name: Plated Steelcaps
item4.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Control Ward
item0.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item1.name: Eclipse
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
8% Omnivamp

  • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

item2.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
item2.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality

Active - Wraith Step: Gain 20% Move Speed and Ghosting for 6 seconds (45s cooldown).
  • Haunt: Gain 40 Move Speed out of combat.

    Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Edge of Night
item5.description:
50 Attack Damage
10 Lethality
325 Health
  • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Electrocute
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

40 Armor

300 Health
25 Ability Haste

    Damage over time effects deal 40% Butcher damage (0.5s cooldown).

item1.name: Control Ward
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: Broken Stopwatch
item2.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item3.name: Edge of Night
item3.description:
50 Attack Damage
10 Lethality
325 Health
  • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

item4.name: Eclipse
item4.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
8% Omnivamp

  • Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Electrocute
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

item0.description:

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

item1.name: Refillable Potion
item1.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

325 Health
  • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

item4.name: Executioner's Calling
item4.description:
15 Attack Damage
  • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item5.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item5.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item1.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
item1.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality

Active - Wraith Step: Gain 20% Move Speed and Ghosting for 6 seconds (45s cooldown).
  • Haunt: Gain 40 Move Speed out of combat.

    Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

item0.name: Knight's Vow
item0.description:
400 Health
10 Ability Haste
300% Base Health Regen

Active - Pledge: Designate an ally who is Worthy (60s cooldown).
  • Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of damage they take to you and if they have less than 50% Health gain 35% Move Speed when running towards them.

    Champions can only be linked by one Knight's Vow at a time. Damage redirection stops if you have less than 30% Health

item1.name: Warden's Mail
item1.description:
40 Armor
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

item5.name: Serpent's Fang
item5.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
  • Shield Reaver: Attacks and spells deal (70 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) additional physical damage to Shielded targets.

    Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item1.name: Goredrinker
item1.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item3.name: Spirit Visage
item3.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item4.name: Sterak's Gage
item4.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 200 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

item5.name: Mercury's Treads
item5.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).
